name: Home For Us
description:
A gameJamed game piece from Global Game Jam'19. I attend it in İstanbul with random people, hope you like it.

If you wanna pass the current level press "N"

Coders: Ege Hoşgüngör, Mustafa Meşe

Graphic Design: Atakan Talay/ Deniz Sadıc

Music: Deniz Sadıc / Erinç Demir
